fields.name: fillLevel
fields.description: Current buffer fill level, i.e. number of epochs currently stored

fields.name: dropsAll
fields.description: Number of dropped epochs since startup. Note: changing the batching configuration will reset this counter.

fields.name: dropsSinceMon
fields.description: Number of dropped epochs since last MON-BATCH message

fields.name: nextMsgCnt
fields.description: The next retrieved UBX-LOG-BATCH will have this msgCnt value.

adjudication.reasoning: The message structure is identical across all generations (M8, M9, and M10). All three extractions correctly identify the 12-byte payload and field offsets. Minor differences in reserved field naming (reserved0 vs reserved1) and description length (some include the config-reset note, some do not) are documentation artifacts rather than protocol changes. The message type fluctuates between 'periodic_polled' and 'output' depending on the manual's taxonomy, but they describe the same behavior for a MON class message.
